The best app to submit any suspicious activity and crime reports on. You can submit a video tip, an image or a written report. We want to serve you. Help us.
Don\'t want to be registered? Click here!

Aniekan built the Watchman app as a Commercial app. This SERVICE is provided by and is intended for use as is.This page is used to inform visitors regarding my policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use my Service. If you choose to use my Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that I collect is used for providing and improving the Service. I will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.

ShelterView cares about it\'s residents and would want to keep the residents aware of crime happening in the estate
Watchman allows you to file missing person reports. So report that family memeber or friend that is missing in the estate. We\'ll find them!
